body: i'm thankful for [this performance video of haim](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jc2x5aHCs6g), which is mesmerizing and made me love them and the songs they perform in it in a new way. i'm thankful for their facial expressions as they sing and play. i'm thankful for their virgin suicides cool girl dancing in the video for "[want you back](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yPQfcG-eimk)." i'm thankful for [this playlist of music grimes likes right now](https://open.spotify.com/user/grimes_spotify/playlist/0LxLPc6gR5yQ2gOX12ADmS), which if you like grimes you will probably like. i'm thankful for [this twitter account](https://twitter.com/usinjuries) that logs american injuries; i'm thankful for [human drama](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/913226188457463808) and i'm thankful to have seen [multiple](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/913222961422852096) [examples](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/913223475086667777) of people punching refrigerators, which seem like really dumb things to punch. i'm thankful that [we can collectively mock people](http://nymag.com/selectall/2017/09/this-is-my-body-no-6-pack-meme-explained.html?utm_campaign=select-all&utm_source=tw&utm_medium=s1) who are annoying. i'm thankful for [this joke](https://twitter.com/topshelftyson/status/900186821631651840) and [this one](https://twitter.com/ilovewonpil/status/912768576137830400) and [this one](https://twitter.com/geekylonglegs/status/913219717132881920) and [this one](https://twitter.com/DrYobbo/status/913245379067383808). i'm thankful for [this insane nathan fielder story](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bJbXsnFKGaU). i'm thankful for [this guide to poetic computing](http://poeticcomputation.info/contents/), which looks interesting. i'm thankful that i don't have to work today or tomorrow. i'm thankful that there are some personal projects i want to do things for, but i'm thankful also to let myself actually rest and consume and recharge. i'm thankful to agree that [doing things is overrated](https://twitter.com/danaanmm/status/912770165015707651). i'm thankful for [this video of an afghan hound in a swimming pool](https://twitter.com/GrrlGhost/status/913043072103174144).
